message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $100 to you. Considering its quality and value, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. This offer includes a limited-time discount, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'd be happy to pay $110 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come up with a solution that works for both of us. Considering the value you place on the product and your budget, I am willing to offer the product at $125. This price still allows us to maintain a fair transaction while ensuring you get the best deal possible. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $125 is still a little more than I'm willing to spend.  I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $115.  Let me know what you think.
